#include <bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long int li;

#define min(a,b) a<=b?a:b
#define max(a,b) a>=b?a:b
#define Fi(i, st, ft) for(i = st;i <= ft; ++i)
#define Fd(i, st, ft) for(i = st;i >= ft; --i)
#define pb(a, b) a.push_back(b)
#define mod 1000000007
#define mp make_pair
#define MAXN 1500000
#define MX 1450000
#define inf 1000000000000000000ll
const int maxBufSize = (10000000);

using namespace std;

li n;
li arr[1000005] , endElement[100005];

li getCeilIndex(li key , li len)
{
	li l , r , mid;
	l = 0 , r = len;
	while(r-l > 1) {
		mid = l+(r-l)/2;
		if(endElement[mid] > key) {
			r = mid;
		} else {
			l = mid;
		}
	}
	return r;
}

li LIS_length()
{
	li i , j , a , b , c , len , ind;
	endElement[1] = arr[1];
	len = 1;
	Fi(i , 2 , n) {
		//cout << endElement[len] << "\n";
		if(arr[i] < endElement[1]) {
			endElement[1] = arr[i];
		} else if(arr[i] >= endElement[len]) {
			len++;
			endElement[len] = arr[i];
		} else {
			ind = getCeilIndex(arr[i] , len);
			endElement[ind] = arr[i];
		}
	}
		
	return len;
}

int main()
{
	li i , j , a , b , c , ans;
	scanf("%lld" , &n);
	Fi(i , 1 , n) {
		scanf("%lld" , &arr[i]);
	}
	ans = LIS_length();
	cout << ans;
	return 0;
}
